software.name: ownstagram
software.description:
ownStaGram is a free photo-sharing software which allows to upload photos from within this site and an available android-app.

Every picture can be shared via an unique url.

template_files.title: app/inc.var.php
template_files.content:
<?php
define('DB_HOST', '_Engines_Environment(dbhost)');
define('DB_USER', '_Engines_Environment(dbuser)');
define('DB_PASS', '_Engines_Environment(dbpasswd)');
define('DB_NAME', '_Engines_Environment(dbname)');
define('DB_CHARACTERSET', 'utf8');
define('DEBUGMODE','false');
define('MailSender', '_Engines_Environment(SelfEmail)');
define('ownStaGramAdmin', '_Engines_Environment(AdminEmail)');
define('siteName', '_Engines_Environment(SiteName)');
define('mytimezone', "_Engines_System(timezone_country_city)");

software.installation_report_template:
goto _Engines_Builder(http_protocol)://_Engines_Builder(fqdn)/
Register as a new user using the email address _Engines_Environment(AdminEmail)
